attributes.action: The EU referendum should be declared null and void.
attributes.background: Subsequent to the results being declared certain members of the Leave campaign have stated in the media that the promise of extra funding for the NHS would be £350M/week was never attainable. This was a central tenant of their campaign and therefore they deliberately misled the voters.

rejection.details:
Apologies, the link previously sent was incorrect. We think that the petition you submitted is a duplicate of the following petition: 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/139789
